review: the worst product that amazon that amazon has produce. it does not work at all.
author: Francis Duhem

review: Small but powerful great stick beats Google Chrome hands down. Love it! lots of stuff wish there was more but I love it.
author: Christopher Colon

review: Best addition for my TV since the DVR,
author: Timothy O. Barb

review: This is the second one Iv'e purchased. One of our favorite things about the Fire Stick is being able to take our TV out by the firepit, deck or hot tub and having access to the shows we enjoy!
author: V.Olsen

review: I had a few glitches registering my device to my amazon account. Amazon e-mailed me shortly after with troubleshooting instructions and a temporary password. I appreciate how quick they were to assess the issue and provide a solution. The device works great now and I am very pleased with it.
author: Caitlin Scharf

review: I bought this after my wife bought the Roku stick.  I cannot get over how well the Fire stick is packaged and how easy setup was.  It was already registered to my Amazon account which made everything super easy.  The streaming is great on this thing.  I absolutely recommend this product.
author: Ronnie "RjSD"

review: It's great, easy and offers so much more boob tube entertainment!
author: LMR
